entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-04-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [dotnet format] CSharpFormattingCodeFixProvider and CSharpRemoveUnnecessaryImportsCodeFixProvider code fixes fail with .NET 9 preview 3 #40174
  • [NETSDKE2E]The winforms application which is generated by self-contained publish cannot run successfully. #40173
  • dotnet watch run (--) --no-restore tries to restore NuGet packages #40172

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #40187
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [wip] Pass RestoreActionConfig into ToolPackageDownloader to pass in restore action options #40185
    Area-Tools

Merged

  • Fix PR builds ran manually or against release branches #40186
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx] Fix the parsing of ContainerImageTags to report invalid tags instead of silently swallowing them. #38045
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 8.0.3
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Fix the parsing of ContainerImageTags to report invalid tags instead of silently swallowing them #38048
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers
  • Identify loongarch64 as valid arch #40169
    untriaged, Area-ReadyToRun
  • Containers 8.0.3xx Package Release Notes #39942
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers
  • Update warning message for containers package detection when building SDK-containerizable project types #39956
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, Area-Containers

Updated

  • Consider global.json for workload* commands #39644
    Area-Workloads
  • [release/7.0.4xx] Manual backport of #37832 servicing fix #38047
    Servicing-approved, Area-Containers
  • Request silent restore for all separate restore steps #40148
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #40048
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Merging internal commits for release/7.0.4xx #40081
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Issue #34508] WIP: Implement --no-cache option for tool install locally #36369
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • add signature VerifySigning for dotnet tools #39268
    Area-Tools
  • Correct arguments passed to the subcommand in presence of -- #40120
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Ubuntu 24.04 Noble Numbat images by default starting in 8.0.300 #39614
    Servicing-approved, untriaged, DO NOT MERGE, Area-Containers
